home.title: Save Water Intelligently
home.description: Discover how to save water with MICA, the intelligent monitoring system that helps you reduce consumption and detect leaks in real-time. Sustainability for Barcelona.

hero.title: The new way to save water
hero.text: We empower Barcelona to conserve water with artificial intelligence-powered sensors.

solution.title: What can you do with MICA?

benefit1.title: Discover where you use water
benefit1.text: You can see real-time and historical water consumption, as well as identify which devices consume the most.

benefit2.title: Detect leaks
benefit2.text: MICA easily detects water leaks and notifies you with an alert to prevent significant damage.

benefit3.title: Receive recommendations
benefit3.text: You'll receive specific recommendations for your consumption to save water and money.

problem.title: Did you know...
problem.text: A study states that 82% of water consumption in our homes comes from just 3 devices: the shower, toilet, and faucet.
problem.info: Do you know which devices consume the most water in your home?

testimonials.quote: MICA has helped me better understand my consumption habits
testimonials.author: Irene

testimonials.quote: I realized that before hot water reaches the shower, more than 10 liters of water are wasted. Now we store this water in a bucket to reuse it.
testimonials.author: Jaime

testimonials.quote: We don't realize how many times we use the toilet.
testimonials.author: Ana

testimonials.quote: My father says my showers use 4 times more water than his. I'm not sure if this app is for me.
testimonials.author: Gabi

product.title: Water Monitoring System
product.description: Explore the technology behind MICA: an IoT sensor and AI that analyzes your water consumption, detects leaks, and provides detailed reports to optimize water usage.

step1.title: A single sensor at the water inlet captures precise data
step1.text: The sensor is easily and quickly installed on the home's water inlet pipe. Powered by long-lasting batteries, it captures precise water flow data and sends it to the cloud in real-time using Internet of Things (IoT) technologies.

step2.title: An AI platform breaks down consumption by device
step2.text: A cloud-based data platform powered by artificial intelligence algorithms breaks down consumption by device, generates personalized recommendations, and can detect leaks. This is achieved through sensor calibration and analysis of statistical consumption behaviors.

step3.title: An application visualizes data and creates a sustainable consumption plan
step3.text: Through a web and mobile application, users monitor their detailed consumption data, compare against other users or recommended limits, receive personalized recommendations, and can provide feedback to the AI algorithm. This allows them to optimize their water consumption and adopt more sustainable practices.

beta.title: Beta Program for Water Saving
beta.description: Be among the first to try MICA! Register for our beta program and get a free smart sensor to control and optimize your water consumption.

hero.text: We're still in the design phase. However, you can sign up today for our beta program to have the chance to be selected and get the sensor and installation for free. Just leave us your email and we'll keep you informed about updates.

benefit1.title: Pioneer Technology
benefit1.text: Be the first to experience innovation in water saving with AI.

benefit2.title: Immediate Savings
benefit2.text: Track your water consumption from day one.

benefit3.title: Collective Impact
benefit3.text: Be part of a community committed to sustainability.

benefit4.title: Free

about.title: Innovation in Water Saving
about.description: Meet the team behind MICA and our mission to combat drought in Barcelona through innovative technology and intelligent solutions for water saving.

history.title: Our history
history.subtitle: Innovating to combat drought in Barcelona.
history.paragraph1: In the summer of 2022, Barcelona suffered one of the worst droughts in its history. While the city entered alert phase, a group of local engineers had a revolutionary idea.
history.paragraph2: Thus MICA was born, with the mission of transforming how we understand and conserve water. Our technology allows Barcelona residents to face each new water crisis with precise data and innovative tools.

step1.title: Idea
items: · Birth of the idea for innovative technology allowing Barcelona residents to face the water crisis

step2.title: Design
items: · Definition of strategic business and operational plan
· Completion of technical hardware and software designs

step3.title: Development
items: · Development of hardware, software, and data platform
· Implementation of the first version of web and mobile application

step4.title: Pilot test
items: · Installation of devices in a sample of homes in Barcelona
· Technology validation with users and training of artificial intelligence algorithms

questions.question: How can I contact you?
questions.answer: You can contact us through the contact form or by sending an email to info@mica.eco.

questions.question: How is the sensor installed?
questions.answer: The sensor will be installed by a qualified plumber at your home's water inlet, where the meter is located. This installation will have no impact on water flow.

questions.question: How can I join the beta program?
questions.answer: By answering the registration form, which is on the 'I want one' page. Once we receive your application, if you pass our selection process, we will contact you.
